description: Use HawkBus to get the next time until the next bus arrives at a specified stop in the Iowa City area.  This skill uses Bongo (Bus-on-the-Go) to provide upcoming bus predictions for a given stop, specified by stop number.  For a complete list of valid stop numbers, or more information about Bongo, please see ebongo.org.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Hawk Bus when is the next bus at stop 7252
Alexa, ask Hawk Bus how long until the bus arrives at 7252
name: HawkBus
shortDescription: Get the time until the next bus arrives at a specified bus stop in the Iowa City area.
